## Introducicci贸n a los conceptos de modelos ARMA para series de tiempo UNIVARIADAS


### Ejemplo de autocorrelaci贸n 1 con data de Nile

```{r}
data("Nile")
head(Nile)
```


```{r}
Nile2 <-  ts(Nile, start =1871, end=1930)
Nile2
```


```{r}

plot(Nile2, type="o")

acf(Nile2)

```



### Ejemplo de autocorrelaci贸n 2 

```{r}
rainf =c(799,1174.8,865.1,1334.6,635.4,918.5,685.5,998.6,784.2,985,882.8,1071)
rain.ts=ts(rainf,start = c(2012,1), frequency = 12)


```



```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot(rain.ts, type="o")
acf(rain.ts)
```



### Ejemplo de autocorrelaci贸n 3 

```{r}
t <- seq(from=1, to =100, by =1) + 10 + rnorm(100, sd=7)
plot(t)

tquarter <- ts(t, start=c(2000,1), frequency=4)
print(tquarter)

```




```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot(tquarter, type="o")
acf(tquarter)

```
